title: Caffi Bar Chapter
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Large cafe, bar, and restaurant "beer hall" attached to an independent cinema. Its long menu includes many veggie items and several vegan mains, plus vegan dessert. Example of vegan main dish might be chestnut and mushroom wellington with cider jus. Hot drinks are fairtrade. Selection of ales and bottled beers (including vegan). Bar stays open later.
